Flow.description: [26-Jun-2024] - Edit condition for getting MDC from metadata (Element: getMDC). - Edit condition for getting MDC manager from metadata (Element: getMDCMgr). - Edit condition for getting Credit team from metadata (Element: getCreditTeam).

formulas.name: TXSHPreScreentoTraderEmailSubject_NotPassed
formulas.expression: "[FYI]" + "[" + {!$Record.SubBU__c} + "]" + "Initial: " + {!$Record.CompanyNameSubject__c} + " Pre-Screen Result from " + {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.FirstName} +" "+{!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.LastName}+" is not pass."

Flow.label: CTRTriggerReqItemPreScreen

start.filterLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8

textTemplates.name: FATXEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear FA Team,

{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has done pre-screened by {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfVP__c}. Please continue to work by proceed via this link.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Requester Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

Responsible Section Head Name: {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.FirstName} {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.LastName}

Request Number: {!$Record.Name}


Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: SHPreScreenCusEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.OwnersCMVP__r.FirstName} {!$Record.OwnersCMVP__r.LastName},

Customer registration pre-screen of {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has been approved by Section Head.

Company Name:{!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

Request Number: {!$Record.Name}

Pre-screen Result by Section Head: {!$Record.SHPrescreenDecision__c}


Please review and proceed via this link.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.OwnersCMVP__r.FirstName} {!$Record.OwnersCMVP__r.LastName},

textTemplates.name: SHPreScreentoTraderEmailBody_NotPassed
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.TraderSheetCompletedBy__r.FirstName} {!$Record.TraderSheetCompletedBy__r.LastName}

Customer registration pre-screen of {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has been rejected by Section Head.

Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

Request Number: {!$Record.Name}

Pre-screen Result by Section Head: {!$Record.SHPrescreenDecision__c}


Please review and re-submit again via this link.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: SHPreScreentoTraderEmailBody_Passed
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.TraderSheetCompletedBy__r.FirstName} {!$Record.TraderSheetCompletedBy__r.LastName},

Customer registration pre-screen of {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has been approved by Section Head.

Dear {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.FirstName} {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.LastName},

textTemplates.name: TXSHPreScreentoTraderEmailBody_NotPassed
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName},

We regret to inform you that the pre-screen of {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} has been rejected by {!$Record.SHPreScreenBy__r.FirstName} {!$Record.SHPreScreenBy__r.LastName}.

Here are the details of the pre-screen:

Company Name: {!$Record.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Responsible {!fmlAccountType} Name: {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.FirstName} {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.LastName}

Request Number: {!$Record.Name}

Pre-screen Result by Section Head: {!$Record.SHPrescreenDecision__c}

Pre-screen Result by TXMD: {!$Record.CMVPPreScreenDecision__c}


Please review and Resubmit/reject by proceeding via this link.

*In case of pre-screen result is not pass, please inform to your customer.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: TXTraderPreScreenCusEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.FirstName} {!$Record.OwnersSectionHead__r.LastName},

We are writing to inform you that {!$Record.Customer__r.Name} has been pre-screened by {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}. You are requested to review and approve or reject their application by clicking on this link.

Company Name: {!$Record.Customer__r.Name}
Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}: {!$Record.ProductName__c}
Responsible {!fmlAccountType} Name: {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.FirstName} {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.LastName}
Request Number: {!$Record.Name}
Pre-screen Result: {!$Record.TraderPreScreenDecision__c}

Thank you for your cooperation and prompt response.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: VPPreScreenCusEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.FirstName} {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.LastName},

Customer Registration pre-screen of {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name} has been {!fmlVPEndorseorReject} by {!$Record.fmlPositionNameOfVP__c}. {!fmlCMVPEndorseorRejectSentence}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Product Name: {!$Record.ProductName__c}

Please find details via this link.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatically generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: VPPreScreenPassCustoCustomerEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name},


We request that you attach the required documents to proceed with your registration via this link.


Company Name: {!$Record.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.Customer__r.Name}

Interested to be: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c}

Responsible Trader Name: {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.FirstName} {!$Record.TraderPreScreenBy__r.LastName}

Best Regards,

Counterparties Registration Automated System
